title: A court filing in the iyO-OpenAI trademark case reveals OpenAI won't use the name "io" for its AI device, which isn't expected to ship before February 2027 (Maxwell Zeff/Wired)
tags: Wired;A court filing in the iyO-OpenAI trademark case reveals OpenAI won't use the name“io” for its AI device, which isn't expected to ship before February 2027
